name: Brootal (Blainexd)
description:
Live through an underground battle where you fight off a grub boss whose only motive is to eat off your roots. The player is a man with outgrown roots all over his body where he fights for his survival. His objective is to defeat the boss using the different kinds of attack. 

The player can grapple with his roots to move around in the level and use it to dodge around.   

Controls:  LMB: Light attack E: Health regain F: Use root grapple Space: Jump
